DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Reduction Pain Intensity Following IV Oral Acetaminophen
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Subject must health status `` healthy '' assess investigator define clinically significant deviation normal medical history , physical examination , vital sign , clinical laboratory determination . 2 . Subject must male , Caucasian , 18 55 year age ( inclusive ) time screen . 3 . Subject must body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 19.0 ≤ 30.0 kg/m2 minimum weight 110 pound ( 50 kg ) screening . Exclusion Criteria 1 . A positive test result human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B ( surface antigen ) , hepatitis C virus antibody Screening . 2 . A history drug allergy , hypersensitivity , intolerance acetaminophen , morphine , capsaicin excipients IV oral formulation use . 3 . A positive test result drug abuse , alcohol , cotinine . 4 . Fitzpatrick Skin Type V VI ( base Skin Type score great 30 . 5 . A history condition might specifically contraindicate require caution use administration drug study . 6 . Any medical , psychiatric and/or social reason exclusion determine investigator .
